lexUnit.name: accede.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: FN: become a party to a agreement or treaty

sentence.text: There can be no alternative now but to press for guaranteed and unrestricted verifications , backed up by tougher international penalties against violators and greater pressure on all nations to accede to the treaty .
A third party has no right to accede ; the treaty must provide for accession , or the parties must have subsequently agreed to it .
The bill , after being passed by the Lords , receives the royal assent , a mere formality , whereby the monarch accedes to the bill .
Belize acceded to the IMO Convention on Sept. 17 .
A united Germany acceded on Oct. 3 , reducing the membership again to 159 countries .

In Burden v. Rigler justices acceded to a submission that a meeting on the highway was ipso facto unlawful , and dismissed the proceedings .

Mozambique and Namibia acceded as the 104th and 105th contracting parties of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade ( GATT ) on July 27 and Sept. 15 respectively .

In Brunei , years ahead of schedule , ASEAN accepted Vietnam as its seventh --- and first Communist --- member , and Burma acceded to a peace treaty leading to membership .

South Africa acceded to the Treaty on the Non - Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons ( NPT ) as a non - nuclear weapon state in 1991 , and International Atomic Energy Agency ( IAEA ) inspectors subsequently verified the completeness of its nuclear dismantlement .
In December 2003 , Libya pledged to eliminate all chemical weapons stocks and munitions and accede to the Chemical Weapons Convention `` without delay. ''
The country acceded to the Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention on 19 January 1982 .
Although Pyongyang acceded to the Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention ( BWC ) in 1970s , North Korea is suspected of having a biological weapon ( BW ) program .
It acceded to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons ( NPT ) in 1970 .

Although Iran acceded to the Geneva Protocol in 1929 and ratified the Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention ( BWC ) in 1973 , the U.S. government believes Iran began biological weapon efforts in the early to mid - 1980s , and that it continues to pursue an offensive biological weapon program linked to its civilian biotechnology activities .
China joined the International Atomic Energy Agency ( IAEA ) in 1984 and acceded to the Nuclear Non - Proliferation Treaty ( NPT ) in 1992 as a nuclear weapon state .
